name: Piggyback
description:
WARNING: WEB VERSION MIGHT NOT WORK, SEE WINDOWS DOWNLOAD

Piggyback is a platformer where you collect NPC's and give them a piggy back, allowing you to stick together. This will allow you to see a wider distance, and unlock previously invisible platforms.

A and D to move left and right, Space to jump, Esc to pause

Made by Explorer017 and JakeyGilly:

https://github.com/Explorer017/GMTK-GameJam-Entry-2021
